newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis Air '96 passenger traffic rises 4.2.
newsitem.headline: Tunis Air '96 passenger traffic rises 4.2.

text.p: Tunisian airliner Tunis Air said it transported a total 2.697,712 million passengers in 1996, up by 4.26 percent from 2.587,529 million passengers in 1995.
The increase is 0.57 percent above the budget forecast, figures obtained by Reuters on Tuesday showed.
Passengers traffic on regular and additional flights grew by 7.23 percent. It edged up by 0.77 percent on chartered flights.
Tunis Air net profits for 1995 amounted 15.1 million dinars, up by 18 percent compared to 12.8 million dinars in 1994. Turnover was 486 million dinars against 481 million dinars.

The state-controlled company has a capital of 53 million dinars. In 1995, it sold 20 percent of its capital for an amount of 32 million dinars in the biggest sell off in Tunisia's privatisation programme so far.
Tunis Air share on the Tunis Stock Exchange was last priced at 17 dinars. ($=1.05 dinar)
